page.title: Philadelphia 76ers
page.text: The Philadelphia 76ers are a professional [[Category: Basketball (sport)]] team based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. They play in the Atlantic Division of the [[National Basketball Association|NBA]]. They have won 3 NBA championships (in 1955, 1967, and 1983). Some of their best players include [[Joel Embiid]], James Harden, [[Tobias Harris]], and Tyrese Maxey. Their main rivals include the [[Celtics|Boston Celtics]], [[Raptors|Toronto Raptors]], [[New York Knicks]], and [[Brooklyn Nets]].

page.title: Raptors
page.text: The Toronto Raptors are a professional basketball team based in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. They play in the Atlantic Division of the [[National Basketball Association|NBA]] Some of their best players include [[Scottie Barnes]], [[Pascal Siakam]], and [[Fred VanVleet]].

page.title: Celtics
page.text: The Boston Celtics are a professional basketball team based in Boston, Massachusetts. They play in the Atlantic Division of the [[National Basketball Association|NBA]]. Some of their best players include [[Jayson Tatum]], [[Jaylen Brown]], and Marcus Smart.

page.title: New York Knicks
page.text: The New York Knicks are a professional basketball team based in New York, New York. They play in the Atlantic Division of the [[National Basketball Association|NBA]]. Some of their best players include [[Julius Randle]], [[RJ Barrett]], and Mitchell Robinson.

page.title: Brooklyn Nets
page.text: The Brooklyn Nets are a professional basketball team based in New York, New York. Some of their best players include Kevin Durant, Kyrie Irving, and [[Ben Simmons]].

page.title: Scottie Barnes
page.text: Scottie Barnes is an NBA player for the [[Raptors|Toronto Raptors]]

page.title: Pascal Siakam
page.text: Pascal Siakam is an NBA player for the [[Raptors|Toronto Raptors]]

page.title: Fred VanVleet
page.text: Fred VanVleet is an NBA player for the [[Raptors|Toronto Raptors]]

page.title: Joel Embiid
page.text: Joel Embiid is an NBA player for the [[Philadelphia 76ers]].

page.title: Tobias Harris
page.text: Tobias Harris is an NBA player for the [[Philadelphia 76ers]].

page.title: National Basketball Association
page.text: The National Basketball Association (NBA) is a professional basketball league based in the United States that is widely regarded as the best basketball league in the world.
